nodes.text: A cave, also known as a grotto, was a void in a section of rock or dirt. Some caves, often called caverns, were large enough for sentient life to build cities in them. The surface of the planet Bilzen was covered in frozen caverns.
At a test firing of the DS-1 Death Star Mobile Battle Station, Lieutenant Commander Orson Callan Krennic stated violence was part of every sentient species, noting that it was painted in caves.
